ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS in order to simplify and reduce duplication of labelling requirements by harmonizing certain food commodity-specific requirements and by repealing others.
